name: Oil Painting by Color Planet
description:
Oil Painting by Color Planet is your favorite anti-stress color by number game with plenty of pictures, including Flower, Animal, People, Food, Landscape, Buildings, Colorful, Holidays, and etc.

The Oil Painting game has a more realistic look than other color by number apps. Show your inner creativity in this game.

Core Features:
- Various pictures to create.
- New pictures every day.
- Explore the popular pictures recommended by editors.
- Useful color palettes while coloring by numbers.
- Editor’s tips for you when painting by numbers.
- Enjoy and share your masterpieces with your friends.

Color by number is not just about coloring, but to enjoy the colorful world. Get Oil Painting by Color Planet and relax!
